member.name: IProvideClassInfo2.GetGUID
member.summary: Retrieves the specified GUID for the object.
member.param: The GUID type. Possible values are from the enumeration.
A pointer to a variable that receives the GUID.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, E_POINTER, and S_OK.

member.name: IProvideClassInfo2
member.summary: An extension to that makes is faster and easier to retrieve an object's outgoing interface IID for its default event set.
